title: SPIRE nextflow schema
description: SPIRE workflow v1 used to generate data on spire.embl.de

outdir.description: Output directory where output is written to

GTDBTK_DATA_PATH.description: Path to the GTDB database directory
GTDBTK_DATA_PATH.help_text: This should be the root directory of a gtdb database.

CHECKM2DB.description: Path to the CheckM2 database file
CHECKM2DB.help_text: This should be the uniref diamond database of checkm2.

GUNC_DB.description: Path to the GUNC database file
GUNC_DB.help_text: This should be the proGenomes diamond database of GUNC.

EGGNOG_DATA_DIR.description: Path to the eggnog-mapper database directory
EGGNOG_DATA_DIR.help_text: This should be the root directory of an eggnog-mapper db.

NGLESS_REFERENCE.description: Path to the ngless human reference genome file
NGLESS_REFERENCE.help_text: This should be the path to a human reference genome fasta file.
